DOC.brief_summary: Metabolic syndrome directly relate obesity . This study investigate use plant base formulation improve condition people metabolic syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: LeptiCore proprietary combination various ingredient show property could beneficial weight loss obese overweight human subject . This study evaluate effect Lepticore bodyweight well parameter associate obesity metabolic syndrome . The study 8 week randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled design involve 92 obese ( mean BMI > 30kg/m2 ) participant ( 37 male ; 55 female ; age 19-52 ; mean age = 30.7 ) . The participant randomly divide three group : placebo ( n=30 ) , LeptiCore formula A ( low dose ) ( n=31 ) LeptiCore formula B ( high dose ) ( n=31 ) . Capsules contain placebo active formulation administer twice daily meal 300 ml water . None participant follow specific diet take weight-reducing medication duration study . A total 12 anthropomorphic serological measurement take begin study 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 week treatment .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg/m2 Total cholesterol > 200 mg/dl LDL cholesterol > 160 mg/dl HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dl ; triglyceride > 150 mg/dl Fasting blood glucose > 100 mg/dl Blood pressure > 130/85 mmHg . Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 kg/m2 ) Diabetes mellitus require daily insulin management Pregnancy/lactation Active infection Systemic disease HIV/AIDS , Use cholesterollowering medication 30 day prior study Enrollment another clinical study within past 6 month .
